product_name: The North Face Nimble Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Nimble jacket for women features a lightweight soft-shell material with incredible stretch that cuts down the windchill and moves with you when you're staying active. TNF(TM) Apex Aerobic fabric has the most stretch of any Apex fabric and offers optimal breathability to help you stay cool and comfortable during activity. Durable Water Repellent finish fends off light rain showers and snow. Elastic cuffs and hem cinch cord allow a snug fit that seals in warmth; zippered hand pockets. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Nimble jacket for women features a lightweight soft-shell material with incredible stretch that cuts down the windchill and moves with you when you're staying active.
